name: Detect miii
description:
you play as a detective and your object is to achieve the best "Facial composites "from the testimonies of victims, in order to unmask the thug !
step 1 : listen carefully the stories of the victims and try your best for the "facial composites"
step 2 : find the thief among the suspects with the help of your drawing


the assets are all drawing but I am running out of time to code .....unfortunately it is a prototype for the moment.... i need to sleep !

Credit
Game design, Art and Code were made during the game jam by roroto sic
